channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drainage blocked 18 chapel st, 27th June
item.description:
The Drainage outside number 18 chapel street is blacked and the rain water keep on the road surface and make my property celler basement damp ... cause the raining water keep on top the road surface than the water going down. To the celler .... and the drain also blocked the water can't be going keep in the Drainage it much effected my celler in damp problem thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, New Street, St Paulâ€™s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on double yellows, causing issues, 27th June
item.description:
Report to Tewkesbury Borough Council - Regular dangerous and inconciderate parking. Both on pavement, bend in road, crest of a hill and near a junction by multiple cars during the evening and night (yellow lines active during the day) I'm reporting this on behalf of the report to Tewkesbury Council. No update required. .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Gardens, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
